member.name: T:SmartHub.Reporting.Utilities.Csv.CsvDefinition`1
member.summary: Class provides customization to CSV serialization process.

member.name: P:SmartHub.Reporting.Utilities.Csv.CsvDefinition`1.Header
member.summary: Gets or sets custom header. By default the header is formed based on class properties.

member.name: P:SmartHub.Reporting.Utilities.Csv.CsvDefinition`1.FieldSeparator
member.summary: Gets or sets the field separator. By default the comma (",") is used.

member.name: P:SmartHub.Reporting.Utilities.Csv.CsvDefinition`1.TextQualifier
member.summary: Gets or sets the text qualifier. By default double quotation mark is used.

member.name: P:SmartHub.Reporting.Utilities.Csv.CsvDefinition`1.EndOfLine
member.summary: Gets or sets the end of line separator. By default the ("\r\n") is used.

member.name: M:SmartHub.Reporting.Utilities.Csv.CsvDefinition`1.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: T:SmartHub.Reporting.Utilities.Csv.CsvDestination
member.summary: Class represents the destination of CSV formatted data.

member.summary: Operator assigns file as destination.

member.summary: Operator assigns object as destination.

member.summary: Operator assigns object as destination.

member.summary: Method appends data record to a processing queue.

member.summary: Method completes serialization process, stops working queues, and closes writing stream.

member.summary: Method completes serialization process, stops working queues, but does not close writing stream.
